app_summary: The application implements a hotel reservation service, built with Go and gRPC. The initial project is extended in several ways, including adding back-end in-memory and persistent databases, adding a recommender system for obtaining hotel recommendations, and adding the functionality to place a hotel reservation.
RCA_gt: The user service is experiencing severe network degradation due to a simulated 99% packet loss injection. While the service process is technically running, the network interface drops nearly all incoming and outgoing packets, causing dependent services to timeout when attempting to authenticate users, effectively rendering the service unavailable.
